abstract: To accelerate Magnetic Resonance (MR) imaging procedures, Multi-Contrast MR Reconstruction (MCMR) has become a prevalent trend that utilizes an easily obtainable modality as an auxiliary to support high-quality reconstruction of the target …

title: Diagnosis of chest X-Rays images with Deep Learning enhanced with discrete wavelet transform
details: FAA Slimani, M Bentourkia - 2024 IEEE Nuclear Science Symposium (NSS) …, 2024
abstract: Deep learning (DL) is increasingly used in medical imaging to improve image acquisition technology and aid in disease diagnosis and classification. In this work, we present an enhancement of DL applied in lung chest X-rays (CXR) imaging first to …

title: Sampling-Pattern-Agnostic MRI Reconstruction through Adaptive Consistency Enforcement with Diffusion Model
details: A Malyala, Z Zhang, C Wang, C Qin - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.14479, 2024
abstract: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) is a powerful, non-invasive diagnostic tool; however, its clinical applicability is constrained by prolonged acquisition times. Whilst present deep learning-based approaches have demonstrated potential in …
